bug.author: jpchen
bug.description: Some of the examples are broken because of distribution interface changes. Identify and fix these broken examples.

comments.comment: We should have tests that check that examples at least don't crash. See <denchmark-link:https://github.com/probmods/webppl/blob/dev/tests/test-examples.js>webPPL's example test</denchmark-link> .

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/karalets>@karalets</denchmark-link> while going through the examples, I added a few minor fixes so they all run (mostly syntax errors and tensor broadcasting). is it safe to open a PR or will this cause conflicts with what you're working on?
